Sentencas: In this paper we report a computational study of the effects of strain on the conductivity of Y-doped ceria (YDC).
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study

Sentencas: This material was chosen as it is of technological interest in the field of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study

Sentencas: The simulations were performed under realistic operational temperatures and strain (oee-) levels.
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study

Sentencas: For bulk and thin film YDC, the results show that tensile strain leads to conductivity enhancements of up to 3.5 x and 1.44 x , respectively.
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study

Sentencas: The magnitude of these enhancements is in agreement with recent experimental and computational evidence.
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study

Sentencas: In addition, the methods presented herein allowed us to identify enhanced ionic conductivity in the surface regions of YDC slabs and its anisotropic character.
Titulo: Strain effects on the ionic conductivity of Y-doped ceria: A simulation study
